ExternalPage.d:Title: Japanese Institute of Certified Public Accountants
ExternalPage.d:Description: Includes information about the practice of public accounting today in Japan. Also includes a brief history of accounting and auditing in Japan (in Japanese and English).

ExternalPage.d:Title: Illinois CPA Society
ExternalPage.d:Description: Offices in Chicago and Springfield, Illinois. News and issues, professional education and job opportunities, member directory, and membership benefits and obligations.
